title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - June 22, 2021
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - June 22, 2021
description:
Adam and Mark reconnect to talk about yesterday's landmark Supreme Court ruling that went against the NCAA and they discuss the FBI's response to the events of January 6th

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
